events.name: Material Design Workshop
events.description: We are going to have a talk+workshop here

events.name: GDG DevFest Surabaya 2017
events.description:
[Register Only Via Google Forms] - http://bit.ly/gdgdevfest2017

In celebration of GDG Surabaya 5th Anniversary, we will bring to you the Newest Technology event of the year - GDG DevFest Surabaya 2017!

GDG DevFest Surabaya brings together experts in Android, Web and Cloud technologies to Surabaya with awesome sessions, workshops and showcases.

In this conference, our goal is to equip you with new knowledge and skills that you can immediately apply or bring back to your companies.

events.name: GDGSurabaya Web Study Jam #DevFest17
events.description: Join us and get certification from Google

events.name: Web Study Jam Session 1
events.description:
REGISTER HERE :
http://bit.ly/msitec2018

Want to sharpen your mobile web skills? Join our study jam to get mobile site certified!

The Mobile Sites certification is a professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate proficiency in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. A Mobile Sites certification allows individuals to demonstrate that Google recognizes them as an expert in mobile sites.

This is a chance to get a professional accreditation that demonstrates you have an understanding of basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development. By learning together we think it’s going to be more fun and more of us are going to be able to complete it.

Benefits include:
• Certificate: Show that you're a certified mobile sites professional with a personalized certificate that you can print!
Get Mobile Site Certification from Google
Register only with this form
http://bit.ly/msitec2018
• Profile page: Share your expertise with a Google Partners public profile page that lists your certifications.

This meetup will explain the benefits of getting certified, how to get certified, and how to share and communicate your certification status with others.

• What to bring
Fully charged Laptop, Internet Connection, Mi-Fi

• Important to know
Please be on time, if not, we have to give the spot to the other person
events.how_to_find_us: Go with a lift to 6th floor, or by escalator and follow the sign, it is inside the ofice

events.name: Cloud Study Jam Session 1
events.description:
REGISTER HERE
http://bit.ly/csj20181

• What we'll do
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Or you already have experience with the platform, and want to learn more?

Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs and Kubernetes labs. Don't worry if you haven't had any experience with GCP or Kubernetes. We will start from the beginning.

If you can't finish during the meetup you will have plenty of time to finish at home and if you finish one quest of labs you will receive a Google Hosted badge for your online profile. You will also be able to finish any of the other labs on your own. Everyone that joins the meetup will get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.

Register only with this form
http://bit.ly/csj20181

• What to bring
Fully Charged Laptop, Internet Connection, Mi-Fi

• Important to know
Please be on time, we are sorry if the spot is given to other attendee if you are not on time
events.how_to_find_us: Go with a lift to 6th floor, or by escalator and follow the sign

events.name: International Women's Day 2018 Surabaya
events.description:
Registration Link
http://bit.ly/iwd2018-sby

We are proud to be hosting the 2018 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference. This event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

International Women’s Day, which is officially on March 8, 2018, is a day to celebrate the achievements of women while calling for greater equality within our communities. As Women Techmakers powered by Google Developer Groups and Womenwill powered by Google Business Group, we plan to do this by improving our programs thus increasing women through increased collaboration and raising awareness through social media. In different regions, the focus of celebrations ranges from general respect and appreciation toward women to a celebration of women's economic, political, and social achievements.

Google with GDG Surabaya, Women Techmakers, GBG Surabaya, and Womenwill will celebrate International Women’s Day 2018.

Registration Link: http://bit.ly/iwd2018-sby

events.name: Build Actions for Your Community
events.description:
REGISTER FREE HERE :
http://bit.ly/iw-actions

Build Actions for Your Community
Kenali lebih dalam tentang Google Assistants, sebuah implementasi Artificial Intelligence yang disediakan oleh Google, untuk dapat berkomunikasi dengan mesin/orang lainnya. Datang dan pelajarilah cara membuat aplikasi Google Assistants Anda sendiri, membuat AI chat bot, dan mengintegrasikan dengan berbagai platform yang dimiliki. Aplikasikan hasil Anda kedalam home-made Google Home, Android Devices, dan berbagai Device yang mendukung Google Assistant, ataupun platform lainnya seperti IoT, dan lain sebagainya.

• What we'll do
“Build Actions for Your Community” is an opportunities for developers to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for their community - whether it's a professional network, interest group, or your hometown. This way, they can build something in an area that they care about or are interested in.

• What to bring
Laptop, Mi-Fi, Internet Connection

• Important to know
There will be mini hackathon - Raspberry Pi 3b as a prize, sponsored from http://digiwarestore.com

events.name: Tensorflow Dev Summit 2018 Viewing Party
events.description:
REGISTER FREE HERE :
http://bit.ly/iw-tensorflow

Tensorflow Dev Summit 2018 Viewing Party
brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for a full day of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.

• What we'll do
It is no question that machine learning is one of the hottest and one of the most important technology topic for developers and we think you can use this as an opportunity to build local machine learning community or engage with your local machine learning users!

• What to bring
Laptop, Mi-Fi, Internet Connection

• Important to know
You will get Machine Learning Crash Course Certificate of Attendance if you finish the course

events.name: I/O Extended 2018 - Recap [Still Open, Register on the spot]
events.description:
REGISTRATION ARE CLOSED
Silakan langsung datang ke venue acara. Namun terdapat konsekuensi kemungkinan tidak mendapatkan lunch dan snack.

Untuk memperlancar kelas CODELAB, pastikan Anda telah melakukan instalasi aplikasi/program yang dibutuhkan. Berikut spesifikasi software minimum yang dibutuhkan:
Android: Built Your First Android App in Kotlin
- Android Studio v.3.1, cara instalasi disini (https://chromplex.com/memasang-android-studio-pada-sistem-operasi-windows-10/)
- Android SDK
- Android Emulator / Device
** Pastikan dapat menjalankan project hello world kosong bawaan Android Studio dengan emulator/device

AR/VR: Building an Augmented Reality (AR) application using the WebXR Device API
- Google Chrome v.69.0 atau yang terbaru
- Web Server Chrome
- ARCore terinstall, klik disini (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.ar.core)
- Android Device yang support ARCore (atau emulator), klik disini (https://developers.google.com/ar/discover/supported-devices)

Flutter: Write Your First Flutter App
- IntelliJ IDEA v.2017 atau VSCode atau Android Studio v.3.1, cara instalasi disini (https://flutter.io/get-started/editor/#vscode)
- Flutter SDK, cara instalasi klik disini (https://flutter.io/get-started/install/)
- Android Emulator / Device

Android: Background Work with WorkManager
- Android Studio v.3.1, cara instalasi disini (https://chromplex.com/memasang-android-studio-pada-sistem-operasi-windows-10/)
- Android SDK
- Android Emulator / Device
** Pastikan dapat menjalankan project hello world kosong bawaan Android Studio dengan emulator/device

Assistant: Google Search Trends for Assistant
- Android Device
- Aplikasi Google, klik disini (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox)

Bagi peserta yang mengikuti HACKATHON, dapat belajar terlebih dahulu disini (https://www.youtube.com/c/gdgsurabayaorg)

KESEMPATAN EMAS!!
Kami juga bekerja sama dengan BTPN Jenius yang akan hadir pada event ini. BTPN Jenius bekerja sama dengan GDG Surabaya untuk memfasilitasi member GDG Surabaya dalam pengadaan Kartu Debit berjenis VISA, dimana akan digunakan dalam workshop/codelab, tanpa biaya administrasi bulanan/tahunan. Bagi peserta yang tertarik dapat mendownload aplikasi Jenius terlebih dahulu melalui link dibawah ini, kemudian melakukan registrasi. Kartu akan dicetak pada saat pelaksanaan event dengan syarat menunjukan NPWP pribadi, partner, atau orang tua kepada tim marketing BTPN Jenius saat event berlangsung.

Apa sih Jenius itu?
http://bit.ly/apakahjenius

Download Jenius di Google Play :
http://bit.ly/jeniusgplay
Download Jenius di App Store :
http://bit.ly/appstorejenius

Cara registrasi Jenius:
https://youtu.be/SSKjx8x3YBQ

FAQ tentang Jenius:
https://www.jenius.com/en/jenius-care/

I/O Extended 2018 - Recap

Merupakan rangkaian acara Google I/O yang diadakan pada bulan Mei 2018. GDG Surabaya akan membawa atmosfer Google I/O di Mountain View, CA, USA ke Surabaya.

Acara akan dimulai dengan sesi keynote dari Googler, kemudian dilanjutkan dengan sesi Codelab yang dapat diikuti. Terdapat beberapa sesi codelab yang bisa dipiih, Flutter, Firebase, Android Kotlin, Google Assistant, Machine Learning, dan VR.

Sampai bertemu.

events.name: Build Actions for Your Community Part 2
events.description:
Build Actions for Your Community
Kenali lebih dalam tentang Google Assistants, sebuah implementasi Artificial Intelligence yang disediakan oleh Google, untuk dapat berkomunikasi dengan mesin/orang lainnya. Datang dan pelajarilah cara membuat aplikasi Google Assistants Anda sendiri, membuat AI chat bot, dan mengintegrasikan dengan berbagai platform yang dimiliki. Aplikasikan hasil Anda kedalam home-made Google Home, Android Devices, dan berbagai Device yang mendukung Google Assistant, ataupun platform lainnya seperti IoT, dan lain sebagainya.

• What we'll do
“Build Actions for Your Community” is an opportunities for developers to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for their community - whether it's a professional network, interest group, or your hometown. This way, they can build something in an area that they care about or are interested in.

• What to bring
Laptop, Mi-Fi, Internet Connection

• Important to know
There will be hackathon - Google Home Mini as a prize
There will be a Jenius Visa Debit Card space, that help access enormous Google APIs, and Infrastructure

events.name: Flutter Study Jam (1)

venue.name: DILo Surabaya
venue.address_1: Komplek Telkom Ketintang. Jalan Ketintang No 156, Ketintang, Gayungan

events.description:
REGISTER FREE HERE :
http://bit.ly/sjflutter

Ayo daftar Flutter Study Jam, belajar cara but Mobile Apps terbaru!
acara nya di :
Hari/Tanggal : Sabtu/ 1 September 2018
Waktu : 08:00 - 16:00 WIB
Tempat : Aula DiLo Surabaya (terbatas untuk 100 orang saja)
Jl. Ketintang 156 Surabaya
https://goo.gl/maps/TpMpiu4D1yo

• What we'll do
Kita akan belajar
1. Installing Flutter
a. Windows
b. Mac OSX

2. Basic Flutter
a. IDE android studio and Visual studio
- Wrap widget
b. Shortcut in terminal
- release
- build
- doctor
- performance overlay
c. Dart hidden technique
d. Flutter development tools
- hot reload
- widget inspector
- autoformatter
e. add plugin, assets

3. Layout & Interaction in Flutter
a. Stateful Widget vs Stateless Widget
b. Layouting
Single Child Layout Widgets
Multi Child Layout Widgets
appBar, Tab Bar,
ListView, Grid View,
c. Navigation
Scaffold, Routing
d. Gestures
e. Orientation

4. HTTP Request & Firebase
List View json data populating
Firebase UI Auth
Firebase Realtime Database

Jika waktu memungkinkan/pelatihan berikutnya :
5. Architecting
App simple architecture

6. Animation in Flutter
Animation
Animation Controller
Tween
Animated Builder

7. Performance
Background thread using isolate
Flutter Inspector
Solving UI Performance janky issue

• What to bring
Laptop, charger, Internet Connection
(We hear you, we have provide more power outlet and Internet connection)

• Important to know
Flutter: Write Your First Flutter App
- IntelliJ IDEA v.2017 atau VSCode atau Android Studio v.3.1, cara instalasi disini (https://flutter.io/get-started/editor/#vscode)
- Flutter SDK, cara instalasi klik disini (https://flutter.io/get-started/install/)
- Android Emulator / Device

GDG DevFests are large, community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas, all-day hack-a-thons, codelabs, and more.

Day, Date: Saturday, 24 November 2018
Time: 09:00 - 16:00 (Registration open: 09:00)
Place: Sekolah Tinggi Teknik Surabaya,
Jl. Ngagel Jaya Tengah 73-77, Surabaya

Registration CLOSED.
We already choose the participant. Check your INBOX or SPAM Folder.

events.name: Firebase Summit Extended 2018 Surabaya
events.description:
REGISTER FREE ONLY HERE (RSVP is not used) :
http://bit.ly/firebasesummitsby

Ikuti Firebase Summit Extended 2018 Surabaya ini untuk belajar membuat mobile app, dengan Firebase. Sebuah mobile platform dari Google untuk membuat sebuah aplikasi berkualitas tinggi, dan melebarkan bisnis Anda. Disini juga terdapat kesempatan untuk bertanya langsung dengan tim developer yang membuat Firebase.

Kapan?
Sabtu, 15 Desember 2018
09:00 - 16:00 WIB

Dimana?
Fave Hotel MEX Surabaya (lantai 7)
https://goo.gl/maps/FhSPTGMF8Er
Jl. Pregolan No.1,3,5, Tegalsari, Kota SBY, Jawa Timur 60262

Acara ini GRATIS, namun kursi terbatas, sehingga akan dilakukan proses RSVP dan seleksi. Setelah mendaftar, calon peserta terseleksi akan mendapatkan email untuk melakukan konfirmasi kehadirannya (+/- 5 hari sebelum acara berlangsung) (Mohon check SPAM Folder, dan beri label Important email tersebut)

Peserta akan mendapatkan merchandise menarik dari GDG Surabaya.
Note : mohon isikan data (terutama email) dengan benar dan teliti supaya email tidak bounce back

Sampai jumpa.
events.how_to_find_us: ke lantai 7, dan cari registration desk dengan banner GDG Surabaya

events.name: IWD Surabaya 2019
events.description:
We are proud to be hosting the 2019 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference. This event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

For the 6th year in a row, Google’s Women Techmakers is celebrating IWD. In partnership with you, our goal this year is to continue to empower women to succeed in Technology.

Time & Place:
Saturday, March 30th 2019
Hotel Ciputra World Surabaya
08:00-16:00

Link for Registration:
https://bit.ly/iwd-19

events.name: Cloud Study Jam GDG Surabaya: IoT in the Cloud
events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!
Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Security, IoT on Cloud, and Machine Learning.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Link for Registration: https://bit.ly/iwd-19 (please select Cloud Study Jam sessions)

events.name: Cloud Study Jam GDG Surabaya : Data, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence
events.description:
Register only here :
http://bit.ly/csj20191

Want to get started on the Google Cloud, Machine Learning, or Artificial Intelligence, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through several Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence.
Then after our live session, you will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete any labs you want

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.

Link for Registration: http://bit.ly/csj20191

events.description:
REGISTER ONLY WITH THIS LINK (We don't use RSVP from meetup):

Welcome to I/O Extended 2019! Join us for some livestream content of the Google I/O conference as well as some live talks and hands-on labs!

This event contains Codelab Sessions, you have to bring your own laptop.

events.name: Tokopedia TechaBreak x GDG Surabaya
events.description:
PLEASE REGISTER YOURSELF HERE http://tkp.me/toped-gdg-sub

-------------------------------------------------------------

Tech a Break is going to come to Surabaya and this time we will collaborate with GDG Surabaya!

Currently, optimization is a hot topic in a growing company or startup, and this time we are going to discuss 2 topics:

1. Browser Rendering Optimization at Tokopedia
Kelvin will explain the improvement in Tokopedia mobile web for better user experience. In this session he will share about browser rendering, why performance matter and also know better chrome dev tools through a live demo.

2. BLoC x Redux in Flutter

Erick will explain Flutter architecture by using BLoC pattern to manage local state and optimize redux pattern to manage global state.

We will be having 2 experienced speakers in this field:
- Erick Pranata (Software Engineer at Renseki)
- Kelvin Mijaya (Software Engineer Lead at Tokopedia)

Mark your calendar and don’t forget to register and come to this event.

Agenda
18.00 : Open Registration
18.30 - 18.45 : Opening
18:45 - 19.15 : Erick Pranata Session
19.15 - 19.30 : Q&A
19.30 - 20:00: Kelvin Mijaya Session
20:00 - 20.15 : Q&A
20.15 - 20.30 : Closing & networking session

*The seats limited only for 100 participants on first come first serve basis
*The session will be delivered in Bahasa
*You can only attend the event if you register yourself at http://tkp.me/toped-gdg-sub

----------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE REGISTER YOURSELF HERE http://tkp.me/toped-gdg-sub

events.name: Kotlin/Everywhere Surabaya
events.description:
Registration Link: http://bit.ly/kotlin-sby19
Registration Fee: IDR 10k

CP: Richard [masked])

Want to get started with Kotlin, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Kotlin/Everywhere event.

Together we'll work through several Android / Google Cloud / multi-platform labs. You will get hands-on experience with Kotlin in Android, multi-platform with Kotlin/Native, Google Cloud Platform and Kotlin/JS.

Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook). The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Chrome or Firefox installed. Don’t forget your charger!

Speaker:
Erick Pranata, Software Engineer @ Renseki
Rui Fernando, Mahasiswa ISTTS, Developer @ Tokopedia
